articles.title: Southeast Asia should diversify energy sources, learn from Europe's Russian 'mistake': Global agency chief - CNA
articles.description: Adopting clean energy would reduce the region’s long-term dependence on fossil fuels, which are prone to price fluctuations beyond countries' control.
articles.content:
He said that various countries pivots to traditional fossil fuels are just temporary and immediate responses to the crisis, but do not alter the path to cleaner energy in the long term.

articles.author: Hans von der Burchard, Clea Caulcutt
articles.title: The awkward lunch: Macron prepares to snub Scholz in Paris - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: EU partners will closely watch whether the French and German leaders can repair bruised relations.
articles.content: BERLIN/PARIS Relations are now so icy between Emmanuel Macron and Olaf Scholz, the leaders of the EU’s two economic powerhouses, that they are even struggling to agree on whether to be seen together … [+8239 chars]
